# torso

**Type Property**

A group name that represents the torso joints.

## Declaration

```swift
static let torso: VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointsGroupName
```

## Getting the Group Names

- **all**: A group name that represents all joints.
- **head**: A group name that represents the head joints.
- **leftArm**: A group name that represents the left arm joints.
- **leftLeg**: A group name that represents the left leg joints.
- **rightArm**: A group name that represents the right arm joints.
- **rightLeg**: A group name that represents the right leg joints.

items.description: A group name that represents all joints.
items.name: all

items.description: A group name that represents the head joints.
items.name: head

items.description: A group name that represents the left arm joints.
items.name: leftArm

items.description: A group name that represents the left leg joints.
items.name: leftLeg

items.description: A group name that represents the right arm joints.
items.name: rightArm

items.description: A group name that represents the right leg joints.
items.name: rightLeg
